name: PRIME Pool
description: The PRIME Pool mostly consists of PRIME, the native token of the Prime ecosystem. Liquidity mining programs are popular for this pool.
story:
PRIME Pool
This is the first pool launched by PrimeDAO. Biased towards PRIME, the native token of the Prime ecosystem, this pool is meant to be the default liquidity pool for long-term PRIME holders.
Methodology
The pool's parameters are governed by members of PrimeDAO. An example parameter is the balance of the pool's respective assets. To learn more about the governance process, please visit the documentation.

name: DGov Pool
description: The DGov Pool — short for "decentralized governance" — consists of forward-thinking organizations that aim to decentralize their organization using blockchain.

name: Defi 7+1 Pool
description: Mainly made up of DeFi blue chips, the DEFI 7+1 consists of the most safe, reliable, and innovative Open Finance projects.
